name: SpaceWarfare
description:
SpaceWarfare is a 2D arcade style shooter game, in which the objective is to survive as long as possible and to collect as many points as possible to achieve a massive high score! Earn credits by destroying enemies to use in the shop to buy more ships and upgrades!

Source code is included for those that are interested, however distributing a copy or remix of SpaceWarfare is not permitted. If you have made a cool change and/or have a cool idea please feel free to tell me!

LATEST UPDATE: Sound has been added to 64 Bit version!
